text: Elijah Moshinsky (8 January 1946 – 14 January 2021) was an Australian opera director, theatre director and television director. He worked at the Royal Opera House, the Metropolitan Opera, the Royal National Theatre and BBC Television. Moshinsky was born in Shanghai and but was raised in Melbourne. Moshinsky died on 14 January 2021 in London, aged 75."Remembering Elijah Moshinsky (1946–2021)" by Kate Hopkins, Royal Opera House, 16 January 2021 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Radio program, BBC Radio 4 – Desert Island Discs, Elijah Moshinsky, 28 February 1993 Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian television directors Category:People from Melbourne Category:People from Shanghai Category:Australian theatre directors
title: Elijah Moshinsky
